author: Walter Thompson
title: What you need to know about COVID-19-related cyberattacks
description: Attack methods logically exploit changes in the global environment. Mass working over remote connection leads to mass remote login activity.
content:
The COVID-19 outbreak has not only caused global disruption, it has also changed the cybersecurity threat landscape. We are observing changing patterns of behaviors from threat actors and noticing waves of coronavirus-related cyberattacks.
To be clear, this … [+1643 chars]
